title.rendered: BECOME A VOLUNTEER DRIVER – DELIVER AID TO UKRAINE

content.rendered:
Become a Volunteer Driver - Deliver Aid to Ukraine

As a volunteer driver, you’ll have the opportunity to transport Ukrainian refugees from the Ukrainian border. Volunteering organizations are also looking for drivers to deliver medicines, food, clothes, and aid to the Ukrainian border. In many cases, but not all, volunteer drivers are required to have their own cars/vans/trucks. For a full list of requirements and type of volunteering position please see the websites below.

To become a volunteer driver, please submit your application below:

  • https://www.fastlaneukraine.eu/volunteers
  • https://www.ukrainenow.org/refuge#have-car
  • https://jobs.help-ukraine.nl/volunteer-drivers/en
  • https://helppeopleleaveukraine.org/posting-category/transport
  • https://www.mitost.org/ukraine/transport-transit/
  • https://all4aid.org/
  • https://www.ivolunteer.ca/
  • https://wehelpukraine.org/
Facebook Groups: 
  • Transport a Sister / Help Ukraine 2022
  • Volunteer Drivers for Refugees from Ukraine

With your help, we will definitely win this war and achieve peace.

Glory to Ukraine!
